name: The Golden Flute
overview: A text adventure from the book "Golden Flutes & Great Escapes - How to Write Adventure Games for the Commodore 64", written by Delton T. Horn. In this game, the player must guide a Magic Chariot through the playing area in search of Terak’s secret hideaway. Once the Golden Flute is in his possession, the player must return it safely to the Woodlands. The object of the game is to reach this goal in as few moves as possible. Naturally, along the way the player will encounter numerous monsters and obstacles. He may also find magical weapons and gold pieces.
